name: Giant Wizards from the Outer Rim!
name_original: Giant Wizards from the Outer Rim!
description:
Giant Wizards from the Outer Rim!

When you're a giant wizard,
All worlds seems tiny...
This was my entry into Ludum Dare 23, where the theme was "Tiny World". It is a turn-based wizard simulator a bit like chaos, except it's on a tiny world map that wraps around and your wizards are giants that can wade through the ocean. Also there's only the one spell ...
Instructions: - Read the README - Do what it says - Know also that dragging with the right mouse button moves the map
